resources.string: It is time to take %1$s pill(s)!

Every time you update your symptoms there is an opportunity to learn more about various Tumors and symptom correlation. It only takes a few minutes a day to empower yourself as a patient and become a part of the solution.
You do not show any sign of Tumor
You have high chances of Tumor, please follow a Neurologist
Please see a doctor or book a appointment from app itself
You have been diagnosed with Brain Tumor , please stick to prescription given by a Neurologist
